hours_text:
# Visit Us

> The Chemung Valley History Museum is located at [415 East Water Street](https://goo.gl/maps/QkfnHPKdp68hMbca6) in the heart of downtown Elmira, New York. The museum is approximately 15 miles east of Corning, 30 miles south of Ithaca, and 55 miles west of Binghamton.

**Gallery Hours:**  
Monday – Saturday 10a.m. to 5 p.m.

Closed Sundays

**Admission:**  
$5.00 – Adults  
$3.00 – Senior Citizens (over 55)  
$1.00 – Students (6-18)  
FREE – Children Under 5  
FREE – Members of the Chemung County Historical Society  
([Click Here to become a member](https://chemung-county-historical-society.square.site/))

**Group tours:**  
Call Susan Zehnder at 607-734-4167 x205 for an appointment.

**Research Room:**  
Monday – Friday 1 p.m. to 5 p.m.  
Research Fee: $5.00 per day for non-members  
Free to members of the Society and students

**The Museum Shop:**  
Open during regular gallery hours or [click here](https://chemung-county-historical-society.square.site/) to shop online anytime.

collections_text:
## [Oral History Workshop with Kathryn Tolbert](https://chemung-county-historical-society.square.site/product/oral-history-workshop-with-kathryn-tolbert/BG4HCX7XAR5MRRG3DPCUQLGK?cp=true&sa=false&sbp=false&q=false&category_id=12)

Kathryn Tolbert will lead a workshop on how to collect family stories. Her own work has been instrumental in the development of the Smithsonian exhibit  _Japanese War Brides: Across a Wide Divide_. **This event is supported by the United States-Japan Foundation.**

[Register Here](https://chemung-county-historical-society.square.site/product/oral-history-workshop-with-kathryn-tolbert/BG4HCX7XAR5MRRG3DPCUQLGK?cp=true&sa=false&sbp=false&q=false&category_id=12)

## [Ghosts in the Museum: 3 Weddings and a Funeral](https://chemung-county-historical-society.square.site/product/ghosts-in-the-museum-3-weddings-and-a-funeral/3EWECMUH7JPUI222GSZ6MMFX)

Join us for a guided tour through parts of the museum rarely open to the public, where the past comes alive in whispered vows, untold tragedies, and the echoes of lives once lived. Along the way, you’ll encounter the newlyweds, the grieving, and those caught somewhere in between, each with a story to share.

[Order Tickets ](https://chemung-county-historical-society.square.site/product/ghosts-in-the-museum-3-weddings-and-a-funeral/3EWECMUH7JPUI222GSZ6MMFX)
